sentences.sContent: Quite clearly one of our favourite of the First Growths this year, it has a lovely, savoury minerality that gives it elegance, despite its power.
sentences.sContent_eng: Quite clearly one of our favourite of the First Growths this year, it has a lovely, savoury minerality that gives it elegance, despite its power.
sentences.sCn: 毫无疑问是今年的头等酒中我们最喜欢的之一，她有迷人、开胃的矿物质味，这使得酒尽管富有力量但不失优雅。

synos.tran: 可口的；开胃的；令人愉快的

words.tran: 可口的；风味极佳的；味美的

trans.tranCn: 可口的；开胃的；令人愉快的
trans.tranOther: a savoury smell or taste is strong and pleasant but is not sweet
